code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductDetails(_ref){let{products}=_ref;const[product,setProduct]=useState(null);const{id}=useParams();useEffect(()=>{fetch(`http://localhost:3001/products/${id}`).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setProduct(data));},[id]);if(!product)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Code: ",product.code]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ingredients",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Ingredients"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[" ",product.ingredients.map((ing,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:ing.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Effect on soil: ",ing.soilEffect]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Effect on plants: ",ing.hazards]}),ing.hazardous&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hazard-warning",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:"\u26A0\uFE0F Hazard Warning"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:ing.hazardInfo})]})]},index))," "]})]})]});}export default ProductDetails;
